comment.author: 67137752@N00
comment._content: When the two almost identical photos (pointed out by swanq) are viewed simultaneously in a stereo-opticon (or other stereo viewer or method) a remarkable three-dimensional image of the Morgan home is created, and the house seems to pop out much more dynamically than with normal human vision.  There is some blurring in the foreground caused my the differences in the pedestrian traffic.

comment.author: 26628881@N08
comment._content: Morgan's house is on Madison Ave and perhaps 37th Street. It's been incorporated into the Morgan Library and remains, at least on the outside, very much as you see it here.
